      • createSlider

        protected javax.swing.JSlider createSlider(int orientation)
        Create the default JSlider used by this if no slider is passed from external. May be ovewritten by subclasses to provide different kinds of sliders.
        Overrides:
        createSlider in class SliderLabeled
        Returns:
        slider
